page.title: 08Les Quennevais School
page.content:
Les Quennevais School and Community centre was built in 1965. It serves the western area of the island as a school for 11 to 16 yr olds, and as a centre providing facilities for adult education and leisure activities. Included in the campus is a library used by both the school and the community.
The school is located at the edge of the estates which have been built in post Second World War years between Red Houses and the sea. Immediately to its north it is bounded by the Railway Walk, the site of the old Jersey Western railway line. Beyond the walk lie the sports fields and the open sand dunes.
